title: Acting on Hope
description:
English TV star Sabra Williams landed in LA with a new career path in mind. And then landed in prison — as an acting teacher. With the encouragement of an Oscar-winning actor, she’s bringing workshops to cell blocks — offering help, hope, and change to those who need it most.

Learn more about Sabra’s work online: CreativeActs.us 

Follow Sabra on Twitter: @sabraarbas
